description: Uniquely UniqueLooking for another level of using your iPad? The Gladius is simple, stylish and designed with usability in mind. Simply slip your hand beneath the hand-crafted leather handle and take your iPad browsing to the next level.Genuinely LeatherMade out of hand-worked durable leather with an earth tone brown color mean one thing: a subtle luxury contrast of organic and inorganic with a truly comfortable grip, once the Gladius is strapped on.Good to GoThe Gladius is the perfect marriage of both protection and function: bind your iPad securely to your palm and start browsing while on-the-go without worrying about accidental drops ever again.Gladius Specifications.Dimensions: 9.7 x 7.5 x 0.5 inchesBe sure to find the official New Trent logo to ensure a 10 month warranty.
title: New Trent Gladius iPad Case compatible: iPad 4, iPad 3 and iPad 2. 360 rotatable, genuine leather hand strap, stand/movie wall clip and Matte Finish.
